name: Dead Weight (Ornithine)
description:
Y'argh, it's our submission from Ludum Dare 40!

Made in collaberation with Marc Jones and Tom Lloyd. This was my first attempt at a game jam, and I am still super proud of how Dead Weight turned out! We had 3 days to make a game to the theme: 'The more you have, the worse it is.' So, the more treasure, crew and cannon balls you have the worse your ship becomes!

Collect treasure and go for the high score! And for an added bonus, try and find all three game over screens! Instructions for play can be found in game!
